com.brightcove.drm.widevine
Class AcquireRightsTask

java.lang.Object
  
      com.brightcove.drm.widevine.AcquireRightsTask

public class AcquireRightsTask
extends

This class performs license acquisition and retrieves rights for the protected Source from the DRM server. This is an asynchronous task. The result of the request will be retrieved from either the onEventListener or onErrorListener handler. After successfully retrieving rights, the onEventListener will emit DrmEvent.TYPE_DRM_INFO_PROCESSED. On failure, the onErrorListener will emit DrmErrorEvent.TYPE_PROCESS_DRM_INFO_FAILED. To map an event to a Source, you can call the DrmEvent's getMessage() method which will return the source's URL. Example usage 

 Source source = new Source("http://example.com/video.wvm");
 mDrmManagerClient.setOnEventListener(new DrmManagerClient.OnEventListener() {
     public void onEvent(DrmManagerClient drmManagerClient, DrmEvent event) {
         if (event.getType() == DrmEvent.TYPE_DRM_INFO_PROCESSED) {
             if (event.getMessage() == source.getUrl()) {
                 // acquired a license
             }
         }
      }
 });
 mDrmManagerClient.setOnErrorListener(new DrmMangerClient.OnErrorListener() {
     public void onError(DrmManagerClient drmManagerClient, DrmErrorEvent event) {
         if (event.getType() == DrmErrorEvent.TYPE_PROCESS_DRM_INFO_FAILED) {
             // did not acquire a license
         }
     }
 });
 AsyncTask<Source, Void, Integer> task = new AcquireRightsTask(
         mDrmManagerClient,
         "https://wvlic.brightcove.com/widevine/cypherpc/cgi-bin/GetEMMs.cgi", 
         "device12345",
         "brightcove");
 task.execute(source);
